create.sql: CREATE TABLE ut_posts( PostID int auto_increment PRIMARY KEY, ObjectID int, UserID int, StartDate int, EndDate int, TypeID int);

field.name: TypeID
field.sql: select t.TypeID,concat(t.Name_$lang;,' (',c.Name_$lang;,')') from ut_post_types t left outer join ut_post_classes c on c.ClassID=t.ClassID order by t.Name_$lang;

select.sql: select p.*,un.Name_$lang; as UnionName,c.Name_$lang; as Structure, concat(u.FirstName,' ',u.LastName,' (',u.Login,')') as User,t.Name_$lang; as Type from ut_posts p left outer join ut_post_types t on t.TypeID=p.TypeID left outer join ut_post_classes c on t.ClassID=c.ClassID left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=p.UserID left outer join ut_unions un on un.UnionID=p.ObjectID

field.name: TypeID
field.sql: select t.TypeID,concat(t.Name_$lang;,' (',c.Name_$lang;,')') from ut_post_types t left outer join ut_post_classes c on c.ClassID=t.ClassID order by t.Name_$lang;
